page.title: 11MUNDESLEY
page.content: Mundesley is the largest of the costal resorts in the Erpingham District of Norfolk _ it has a population of about 2000. There are lots of facilities for the visitors who come to enjoy the lovely sands, where bathing, boating and fishing can be enjoyed. In the Coronation Hall, Mundesley possesses an excellent centre for entertainments, the many village societies and public meetings. Mundesley is celebrated for its bracing healthy climate, and is well provided with hotels, guest houses, chalets and appartments for the accommodation of visitors. The loss of the railway was a major blow to Mundesley, but the building, in the late seventies of the nearby Bacton Gas Site has assured prosperity for the village.
